titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit multicandidate political committee contributions and expenditures in elections for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 01/07/1997--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit contributions in a Federal election by any person other than an individual or a principal campaign committee.
